org.nothing.JdbcAction

Uses of JdbcAction in org.nothing
 

Subinterfaces of JdbcAction in org.nothing
 interface ChainableJdbcAction<T>
          Augments a JdbcAction with chaining capabilities
 

Classes in org.nothing that implement JdbcAction
 class BaseChainableJdbcAction<T>
          A base class you might inherit from that handles the chaining logic defined in ChainableJdbcAction

          Wraps a JdbcAction into an action that catches any thrown SQLException and returns a user supplied value instead of failing.

 ChainableJdbcAction<T> BaseChainableJdbcAction.then(JdbcAction<?> action)
           
 ChainableJdbcAction<T> ChainableJdbcAction.then(JdbcAction<?> action)
          returns a new ChainableJdbcAction (so that it can be chained with other actions) that executes the current action then the argument action and returns this action's result

          returns a new ChainableJdbcAction (so that it can be chained with other actions) that executes the current action then the argument action and returns the argument action's result
